import React from "react"; import { Link, useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; import Axios from "axios"; // import firebase from "../../../services/firebase"; import { ToastContainer, toast } from "react-toastify"; import "react-toastify/dist/ReactToastify.min.css"; export default function Login() { const [formData, setFormData] = React.useState({ email: "", password: "", }); const submit = async () => { const { email, password } = formData; const httpResponse = await Axios.post( "http://localhost:3001/api/auth/login", { email: email, password: password, } ); if (httpResponse.data) { const data = JSON.stringify(httpResponse.data.authUser); window.localStorage.setItem("authUser", data); toast.success("Login berhasil"); } }; const handleInputChange = (event) => { const { target } = event; const { name, value } = target; setFormData((prevState) => ({ ...prevState, [name]: value })); }; return ( <>
